Control Name: Assigns Responsibility and Accountability for Managing Vendors and Business Partners—The entity assigns responsibility and accountability for the management of risks associated with vendors and business partners.

control_attributes.SubCategory: CC9.2 The entity assesses and manages risks associated with vendors and business partners.
